metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35531 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
In LibRaw, an out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists within theget_huffman_diff() function (libraw\src\x3f\x3f_utils_patched.cpp) whenreading data from an image file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35531` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.19.5-1ubuntu1.1
libraw19 - 0.19.5-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.19.5-1ubuntu1.1').
darktable package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
digikam package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
